# The Shekel Project

Airdropped to whitelisted wallets and given with design/art competitions. **Price of each NFT**: N/A **Links**: * [Token on RadixScan.io](https://www.radixscan.io/token/shkl_rr1qdm3llhz6lx24zywqdersjzgtd2vs9wl7kqzfsezkdyqvpseeq) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MesoShekel) * [Telegram](https://t.me/MesoShekel)
